alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jones, east central Lenoir, west central Craven, northern Onslow, southeastern Duplin and west central Pamlico Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Fort Barnwell to near Catherine Lake. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, New River Station, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Trent Woods, River Bend, Phillips Crossroads, Richlands, Maysville, Askins, Catherine Lake, Kellum, Cypress Creek, Midway Park, Verona, Comfort and Fort Barnwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
